mapper.select: SELECT s.id AS id, s.name AS name, s.logo AS logo, s.seller_id AS sellerId, s.contact_name AS contactName, s.contact_tel AS contactTel, s.contact_phone AS contactPhone, p.name AS province, c.name AS city, s.area AS areaId, a.name AS areaName, s.address AS address, s.longitude AS lngtd, s.latitude AS lattd, s.images AS imageUrl, s.labels AS labels, s.category_id AS categoryId, s.category_details AS categoryDetails, s.store_detail AS storeDetail, s.create_time AS createDate, s.enabled AS enabled, (SELECT Avg(r.score_avg) FROM product_info r WHERE r.store_id = s.id) AS avgScore FROM store_info s LEFT JOIN province_info p ON s.province = p.id LEFT JOIN city_info c ON s.city = c.id LEFT JOIN area_info a ON s.area = a.id WHERE s.id=#{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT s.id AS id, s.name AS name, s.logo AS logo, s.seller_id AS sellerId, s.contact_name AS contactName, s.contact_tel AS contactTel, s.contact_phone AS contactPhone, p.name AS province, c.name AS city, s.area AS areaId, a.name AS areaName, s.address AS address, s.longitude AS lngtd, s.latitude AS lattd, s.images AS imageUrl, s.labels AS labels, s.category_id AS categoryId, s.category_details AS categoryDetails, s.store_detail AS storeDetail, s.create_time AS createDate, s.enabled AS enabled FROM store_info s LEFT JOIN product_info pro ON pro.store_id = s.id LEFT JOIN province_info p ON s.province = p.id LEFT JOIN city_info c ON s.city = c.id LEFT JOIN area_info a ON s.area = a.id WHERE pro.id=#{prodId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
